deployment-00001.content: Find Coolify container by git commit hash in image tag for artisan
deployment-00001.justification: Multiple failed attempts on fotos-* containers before discovering Coolify container with hashed name holds the Laravel app at /var/www/html/artisan
deployment-00001.evidence: Container sk8g80kw0kswsc4w0ww04c8k-* with image tag containing commit 9186629; fotos-php had no artisan. Artisan path: /var/www/html/artisan

deployment-00002.content: Ignore fotos-* containers for Laravel artisan; use Coolify sk8g* containers
deployment-00002.justification: Server runs two stacks: legacy fotos-* and Coolify-managed. Only Coolify containers have the Laravel app.
deployment-00002.evidence: fotos-php, fotos-queue, fotos-scheduler containers do NOT have artisan; sk8g80kw0kswsc4w0ww04c8k-* does

project_structure-00003.content: Backend and frontend are separate git repos; commit from each subdirectory
project_structure-00003.justification: Prevents 'not a git repository' errors when running git from parent photostack-saas/ directory
project_structure-00003.evidence: git status from photostack-saas/ root failed; .git exists separately in backend/ and frontend/

testing-00004.content: Use `php -l` for local syntax verification; tests need Docker postgres
testing-00004.justification: php artisan test fails without Docker DB; php -l validates all files locally with zero errors
testing-00004.evidence: php artisan test failed with 'could not translate host name postgres'; php -l succeeded on all 10 modified files

project_structure-00005.content: Services use domain subdirectories (Services/Tablo/); resolve paths via Glob first
project_structure-00005.justification: Only session failure was guessing flat path for TabloMediaService; Glob would have found correct subdirectory path instantly
project_structure-00005.evidence: TabloMediaService.php was at app/Services/Tablo/TabloMediaService.php, not app/Services/TabloMediaService.php
